CanvasRenderingContext2DCreateImageData.summary:
The CanvasRenderingContext2D.createImageData() method of
the Canvas 2D API creates a new, blank object with the
specified dimensions. All of the pixels in the new object are transparent black.

remarks.para:
-The interface defining this method:
-
-Pixel manipulation with canvas

CanvasRenderingContext2DCreateImageData.returns:
A new object with the specified width and height. The new
object is filled with transparent black pixels.
